name: Flutter developer
description:
Focus 21 is working as a development service provider for different kinds of North American based companies. We are searching for the certain specialists who can drive the work within our multicultural team. Most of the work will be conducted remotely, there will be no need to spend your time visiting the office.

We are looking for someone who is ready going to have fun writing software within our team!

Responsibilities:
Software Engineer will develop software across the mobile stack.

Your specific responsibilities will include:

  • Working on product implementations and interacting directly with clients
  • Conducting regular code deployments across multiple environments
  • Integrating external data sources and best-in-class 3rd-party technologies

You’ll be a great fit if you have:

  • 2+ years of professional work experience in software engineering
  • Knowledge of Flutter or former experience with Java or Javascript and passion to start with Flutter/Dart
  • Strong verbal and written English language
  • Exceptional ability to organize work and excellent follow-through

Will be a plus:

  • Highly interested in a fast-paced software development environment
  • Passion for learning new things and continuous improvement
